languages.text: Голые койки из листов металла покачиваются на ржавых цепях. Свалиться с такой не составит труда.
Bare beds made from metal sheets swing back and forth on rusted chains. Whoever is forced to sleep on them, it would not take much for them to fall.
languages.original_text: Голые койки из листов металла покачиваются на ржавых цепях. Свалиться с такой не составит труда.

traits.locale_text: Bare beds made from metal sheets swing back and forth on rusted chains. Whoever is forced to sleep on them, it would not take much for them to fall.
Bare beds made from metal sheets swing back and forth on rusted chains. Whoever is forced to sleep on them, it would not take much for them to fall.
Bare beds made from metal sheets swing back and forth on rusted chains. Whoever is forced to sleep on them, it would not take much for them to fall.
Bare beds made from metal sheets swing back and forth on rusted chains. Whoever is forced to sleep on them, it would not take much for them to fall.
Bare beds made from metal sheets swing back and forth on rusted chains. Whoever is forced to sleep on them, it would not take much for them to fall.
Bare beds made from metal sheets swing back and forth on rusted chains. Whoever is forced to sleep on them, it would not take much for them to fall.

languages.text: Camas sencillas hechas con láminas de metal que se balancean de un lado a otro, suspendidas por cadenas oxidadas. Cualquiera que se vea forzado a dormir en ellas podría caerse fácilmente.
languages.original_text: Bare beds made from metal sheets swing back and forth on rusted chains. Whoever is forced to sleep on them, it would not take much for them to fall.

traits.locale_text: Camas sencillas hechas con láminas de metal que se balancean de un lado a otro, suspendidas por cadenas oxidadas. Cualquiera que se vea forzado a dormir en ellas podría caerse fácilmente.

languages.text: Nackte Betten aus Metallblechen schwingen an rostigen Ketten hin und her. Wer auch immer gezwungen ist, darauf zu schlafen, es wäre nicht viel nötig, damit sie hinausfallen.
languages.original_text: Bare beds made from metal sheets swing back and forth on rusted chains. Whoever is forced to sleep on them, it would not take much for them to fall.

traits.locale_text: Nackte Betten aus Metallblechen schwingen an rostigen Ketten hin und her. Wer auch immer gezwungen ist, darauf zu schlafen, es wäre nicht viel nötig, damit sie hinausfallen.

languages.text: Des lits nus en tôle se balancent d'avant en arrière au bout de chaînes rouillées. Il suffirait d'un rien pour faire tomber quiconque aurait le malheur d'y dormir.
languages.original_text: Bare beds made from metal sheets swing back and forth on rusted chains. Whoever is forced to sleep on them, it would not take much for them to fall.

traits.locale_text: Des lits nus en tôle se balancent d'avant en arrière au bout de chaînes rouillées. Il suffirait d'un rien pour faire tomber quiconque aurait le malheur d'y dormir.

languages.text: 金属板做成的床板挂在生锈的铁链上，来回晃动。无论是谁被迫睡在这些床上，恐怕都过不了多久就会摔下来。
languages.original_text: Bare beds made from metal sheets swing back and forth on rusted chains. Whoever is forced to sleep on them, it would not take much for them to fall.

traits.locale_text: 金属板做成的床板挂在生锈的铁链上，来回晃动。无论是谁被迫睡在这些床上，恐怕都过不了多久就会摔下来。

languages.text: 錆びた鎖に繋がれた金属板だけの素のベッドが前後に揺れている。その上で睡眠を強いられた者は、早々にベッドから落ちてしまうだろう。
languages.original_text: Bare beds made from metal sheets swing back and forth on rusted chains. Whoever is forced to sleep on them, it would not take much for them to fall.

traits.locale_text: 錆びた鎖に繋がれた金属板だけの素のベッドが、前後に揺れている。その上で睡眠を強いられた者は必ず、早々にベッドから落ちてしまうだろう。
錆びた鎖に繋がれた金属板だけの素のベッドが前後に揺れている。その上で睡眠を強いられた者は、早々にベッドから落ちてしまうだろう。

languages.text: Metal plakalardan yapılma çıplak yataklar, paslı zincirlerin üstünde bir ileri bir geri sallanıyor. Üstlerinde yatmaya zorlanan kişilerin düşmesi işten bile değil.
languages.original_text: Bare beds made from metal sheets swing back and forth on rusted chains. Whoever is forced to sleep on them, it would not take much for them to fall.

traits.locale_text: Metal plakalardan yapılma çıplak yataklar, paslı zincirlerin üstünde bir ileri bir geri sallanıyor. Üstlerinde yatmaya zorlanan kişilerin düşmesi işten bile değil.
